name: spaceperialist
description:
A game I made for school through unreal engine blueprints about two years ago,  uploading it here to preserve it.

You spawn near your planet, but without new resources it will die! Go to nearby planets to harvest theirs and bring them back to yours.

As you harvest different kinds of planets you will get different upgrades (green - health, blue - speed, red - attack speed, purple - faster upgrades) and different upgrades to your ships.

When all other planets have been harvested, an attack will launch on yours! Defeat all the enemy space ships to win.

controls:

wasd to move

left mouse button to shoot

right mouse button to beam resources

space to boost (when unlocked)

p or esc to pause

r to reset
